titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, on board May Frere, Muscat Harbour to Messrs Remington and Company

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Letter thanking them for the manner in which they have handled Pelly's financial affairs and requesting that should any calls or demands be made on the banks shares which cannot be met with the finances already with them that they pay them on his behalf and he would immediately arrange their repayment.The letter also informs them of his securities with the Bank and requesting they recover them using his safety deposit receipt and take charge of them on his behalf.
